name: meta-plugin-manager
description: Skills-first teaching toolkit with domain hub architecture for Claude Code plugin development - 5 domain routers + single plugin-worker for noisy analysis

hooks.prompt: Initialize meta-plugin-manager v6.0 context. Domain hub architecture with 5 router skills (plugin-architect, skills-architect, hooks-architect, mcp-architect, subagents-architect) + single plugin-worker for noisy analysis. Skills-first teaching ecosystem with quality validation.
